com.vividsolutions.jcs.qa.offsetcorner
Class BoundaryShell

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.qa.offsetcorner.BoundaryShell
public class BoundaryShell
extends java.lang.Object

Models a polygon shell on the boundary of a dataset. Allows extremal boundary edge points to be computed.
